trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the deletion of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event handler, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消中某一行的删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>事件处理程序中，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs"></xref> class.
This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`dataGridViewRow`要初始化值的参数值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The row the user is deleting.
Gets the row that the user is deleting.
The row that the user deleted.
